mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Areca (Palmae: Arecoideae) in Borneo

nomenclature.name: Areca insignis var. moorei
nomenclature.author: (J.Dransf.) J.Dransf.
nomenclature.type: Borneo, Sarawak, 1st Division, Bako National Park; Moore; 9109

synonymy.name: Pichisermollia insignis var. moorei
synonymy.author: J. Dransf.
synonymy.bibref: J. Dransf. in Bot. J. Linn. Soc. 81: 40 (1980)

div.p: Borneo, local in Sarawak and Brunei, confined to kerangas forest.
The type variety seems to be confined to the 4th and 5th Divisions of Sarawak and Brunei. A. insignis var. moorei is more widespread but still not known outside Sarawak and Brunei.
